message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it's a fantastic deal, what do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the item, but I was hoping to stay within my budget of $80. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $100 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $150?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still not able to meet at $150. Could we perhaps agree on $120?
